name: nasin-pi-lipu-nimi
description: JavaScript-powered single-page-app which demonstrates a method of looking up Sitelen Sitelen glyphs (in the Toki Pona language).
author: jan Lesate

scripts.data:fetch: curl -so - https://linku.la/jasima/data.json | jq '[.data[] | select(.usage_category=="core" or .usage_category=="widespread" or .usage_category=="uncommon") | {word, sitelen_emosi, sitelen_sitelen, def: .def.en}]' >src/data/definitions.json
